Title: Pillow Talk
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Peter Knight
Actors: Fred Armisen, Kristen Bell, Neil Casey, Jessica Chaffin
Plot: Nick drags Andrew into the city to visit an old camp crush, but the day doesn't go as planned. Jay embarks on an emotional journey with his pillow.
